analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma tika duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: Nakusalaṁ napariyāpannaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato pariyāpanno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na kusalam na pariyāpannam dhammam paṭicca abyākataḥ pariyāpannaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Naakusalaṁ napariyāpannaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato pariyāpanno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na akusalam na pariyāpannam dhammam paṭicca abyākataḥ pariyāpannaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Naabyākataṁ napariyāpannaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato pariyāpanno dhammo uppajjati
analyzed: na abyākatam na pariyāpannam dhammam paṭicca abyākataḥ pariyāpannaḥ dhammo uppajjati

original: hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā pañca, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate pañca.
analyzed: hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā pañca adhipatiyā pañca pe vipāke tīṇi pe avigate pañca

original: Nakusalaṁ naapariyāpannaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā kusalo apariyāpanno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na kusalam na apariyāpannam dhammam paccayā kusalaḥ apariyāpannaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Nakusalaṁ naapariyāpannaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā abyākato apariyāpanno dhammo uppajjati
analyzed: na kusalam na apariyāpannam dhammam paccayā abyākataḥ apariyāpannaḥ dhammo uppajjati

original: hetupaccayā … dve. (Akusalamūle dve, dukamūle dve.) Hetuyā cha … vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate cha.
analyzed: hetu paccayā dve akusala mūle dve duka mūle dve hetuyā cha vipāke tīṇi pe avigate cha
